experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.details: As a software engineer at ExtraInch Technologies, I was involved in the following projects or tasks:
experiences.details2: Bantu Core Banking System: The goal of this program is to automate all retail and corporate banking processes with best of breed functional modules and a full complement of state-of-art features. I was tasked to ensure that functional and technical inputs met the desired goal of the product offering through support and maintenance to the existing clients.
experiences.details3: Software Development: whose goal is to develop software and web-app portals to be used by new and existing clients of the company. Also develop and integrate APIs to the existing or new software applications.
experiences.details4: Project Implementation: whose goal is to conduct system implementation of the core banking software to new clients. Initiate the product fitment process to meet the clientâ€™s business review requirements and operations, train users and perform data migrations into the system.

experiences.title: Freelance Software Developer
experiences.details: I design and develop quality softwares, while considering the basic principles, strategies and standards required for a complete software.
experiences.details2: Ecommerce Site: I developed a real-time shopping Cart Website with both MERN and Django Stacks. These online business projects displayed products where users can add and remove products to/from their cart while also specifying the quantity of each item.

experiences.title: Freelance Web Developer
experiences.details: I specializes in customized website design, development and maintenance to match the specific requirements of my clients. My eye-catching and striking websites are professionally designed for ease of navigation.

projects.name: Campgrounds-App
projects.detail: This is a campground rating app, where users can create their own campgrounds, view and comment on others' campgrounds. This is a small project in RESTful routing with Nodejs. It uses the following technologies : Node.js, Express.js, Passport.js, jQuery and MongoDB.

projects.name: Photography Site

projects.name: Simple-Social Media Site(Django)
